有依賴兒童之家庭補助: Aid to Families with Dependent Children {=AFDC}

社區發展推行途徑：直接法或方案取向: Community Development Approach: Direct or Program-oriented

社區發展推行途徑：間接法或方案取向: Community Development Approach: Indirect or Process-oriented

社區中橫的關係或內部系統: Community Horizontal Relationship or Internal System

社區中縱的關係或外部系統: Community Vertical Relationship or External System

消除對婦女一切形式歧視公約: Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women

兒童權利公約: Convention on the Rights of the Child

智能障礙者權利宣言: Declaration for Rights of Mental Retardation

兒童權力宣言: Declaration of Rights of the Child

社會進步及發展宣言: Declaration on Social Progress and Development

確定給付制: Defined Benefit Plan, Defined Benefit Scheme

確定提撥制: Defined Contribution Plan, Defined Contribution Pension

精神疾病診斷與統計手冊: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorder

聯合國善後救濟總署: Head-office of Relief and Reconstruction of the United Nations

社會工作實務的全面模式: Holistic Model of Social Work Practice

國際社會工作學校協會: International Association of Schools of Social Work

身心障礙國際分類: International Classification of Impairment, Disabilities and Handicaps

國際身心障礙者日: International Day of Persons with Disabilities

國際消除貧窮年: International Year for the Eradication of Poverty

多元性傾向社群: Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, amd Transgendered Community {=LGBT Community}

紐西蘭志願性長期儲蓄制: New Zealand Voluntary Long-term Savings Scheme; KiwiSaver

經濟合作與發展組織: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development {=OECD}

身心障礙者就業安置: Placement for the Disabled or Handicapped

全包式老人照護計畫；統包式老人照護計畫: Program of All-inclusive Care for Elderly {=PACE}

聯合國經濟社會理事會: United Nations Economic and Social Council

聯合國教科文組織: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

高齡問題維也納行動計畫: Vienna International Plan of Action on Aging
